column1: godak pin amatituma budusaranai siylaludena ikmanata suwawewa.
Apage Ghawrawaneeya Subhapethum Gharu Namal Amathi Thumani.
Oba Sema Wenuwen Apage Ghawrawaneeya Pesasum Saha Sthuthiya Api Piliganwanawa Gharu Namal Aemathi Thumani.
Apage Ghawrawaneeya Pesasum Obathumanla Wenuwen
Eliyata waren.  Habai tani paksayak hadana chande ilapan uba udinma dinanawa.
Sri Lanka deshapalanaya kalaheki vayasa 65 ta seema kalayutui
Oba thuma wage minissu me rate bohoma adui..oba thuma e karapu sathkara a pita mathakaii
obathuma kawadawath jeevithayen parajaya nouna manussayek kiyala oppu kala...oba thuma gana adambaraiii...niduk neerogiisuwa labewa obata.
Godak pin oba thumata minisunta pihita una budu saranai
Mona anduwa unath me wage minissu thami parlimenthuwata yanna oni
duppath minissunge duka danna jana hitha wadi minissu pissuwen wage chande denna oni me minissuta kada giyata kamak na me ayata aththatama
ikmanata sathi dekakata wahuwanam ewari neda amathi thuma..
methuma karapu dewal me ratata den innakisima deshapalakayek karala ne.mama methumata hadawathinma garu karanawa.
Hoda adarsamath wedak .Api semada oba samagai
Ratata adare tiyana vipaksayk
Niyama wedak. Jaya wewaa sir..
Obata rata hadanna puluwan janadipatithumani
Aththawashayenma hoda wedak sir.. mehema palakayo thami rata awashya
Attatha .obatuma kiyana da.apata ratak one.
rata jathiya wenuwen wada karana minisun. .
abinawa janadipathithumai apa ayushath aran jeewathwanna. deergayusha parthana karanawa.tharuwan saranai.
Supiri nayakayek behi kala supiri pasala
Api pathuwa janapathi oba theruwan saranai oba thumata
Ape janadi pathi thuman a gamathi thumanta dirgayusa labava aparatata bihiunu akama daviya obai methiduni tharuvan saranai
Jayen jayama wewa uba tumata....mage rata rakinna yoda bala yoda sakthiya labewa.nidik nirogi suwen kal gevimata obata bs ...
Dirgayusa labaewa budu saranai siyaludavi pihitai
Obathuma Parliament sitiya yuthiyi,deal karayek newei
Me panatha parada karanna obathumata shakthiya lebeva
Obathuma niwaradi bawa wishwasa karana boho pirisak rata thula tawamath innawa.
Rata Gana hitanne oba Pamanai Sir
Awanka nihatamani desapalachnayek budusaranai
oba thuma kalutharin tharaga kaloth mama oba thumata chandaya denawa
Oba thumata muluratema ashirwadaya labewa
obathumalawage ugatthu merate nayakathwayata enna oni.
ape rata wenuwen kataha kala obata goodak pin.apa oba samaga innawa.budu saranai
Ape Rata ta oni obathuma wani uthum aya
budusaranayi obathumata bimmattame ape siyalu sahayogaya
Ape Anagatha janapathi jayawewa
mahatma deshapalanayata pivisenna dairya labewa
niwaredi wanna uthsaha keranna.paksha bedhayen thorewa agaya keremi.
Theruwan sarenai Wijedasa mathinduni.niwaredi gamannaketa pivisenna dairya labewa
Thawa thawath oba thumata sakthiya diraya labewa
Aniwaryenma obathuma lankawe janadipathi wiyayuthui.
Mona peththe hitiyath oba thumata aththa ktha krnna Kondak tiyenwa
Obathumage sarala nirbeetha pehedili kireema ithama kalochitha kriyawak
Obathuma adikarana amethiwrya widiyta purogaami mehewarak ishta kalaa
Weradi pennawa denna oone nethnam manthree kamen wedak nehe
obathumage ugathkama api garu karanwa, jadapaalana samayedthi thaniwa satan kalaa
Obathumaa ape rata gelapena naayakayek
me rate obathuma wge ayata thenak nehe
